about.abouttext2: The Old North End is one of the most charming neighborhoods in the entire State of Colorado. It's connected to the North side of Downtown Colorado Springs and has a rich history that dates back to the 1800's. People are drawn to the craftsmanship and character of these historic downtown homes with mature trees and seasoned landscaping. Large front porches, tall ceilings, handmade custom millwork, and charming sidewalks are all characteristics of the Old North End in downtown Colorado Springs.
